education.title: Education
education.university: University of New South Wales (UNSW), Sydney
education.courses: Web Front-End Programming, Data Structures and Algorithms, Object-Oriented Programming, Software Engineering Fundamentals, Computer Systems Fundamentals, Software Construction: Techniques and Tools

achievements: Built and optimized core features for the company website using modern frontend and backend stacks.
Participated in website SEO and performance improvements.

projects.title: AI Image Generation Platform Website
description: Implemented the frontend of an AI image generation platform using Vue 3 and Nuxt 3 framework.
Migrated and transformed data to MongoDB, including data cleaning and restructuring to optimize database performance.
Implemented i18n internationalization to support multiple languages, enhancing global user accessibility.
Handled website SEO (Search Engine Optimization) to enhance discoverability and improve performance metrics.
Using FastAPI and MySQL (SQLAlchemy) to build Comment / Emoji / Rating system for the platform.

projectsData.title: StudyShare - Note Sharing Platform
description: Led a team of 4 developers to build a full-stack note-sharing platform during the 6-day DevSoc Blueprint Hackathon at UNSW.
Implemented the complete note upload system and note details page, including frontend UI and backend integration.
Designed an intuitive interface for students to easily upload, browse, and download course notes in PDF format.
Organized notes by courses with efficient categorization to enhance searchability and user experience.
Collaborated closely with team members to ensure seamless integration between frontend and backend components.
Planned future AI integration to analyze notes and automatically generate practice questions for enhanced learning.

achievements: Contributed to the development of the association website homepage using NextJS
Assisted in building the Discord bot management system, calling LLM API to convert meeting recordings to text and generate task lists.
Developed backend services for the society website using FastAPI, Python, and PostgreSQL(Supabase).
Creating course display and management system for AI-related educational content.
Collaborated with other subcommittees to align technical solutions with society needs.
